embedmoreimages.plugin.js.description:
Embed formats you usually can't.

Expanded description:
Embed file formats that Discord can but won't support for whatever reason. 

This plugin currently adds embed support for sequenced WebP, APNG, AVIF, BitMaP, ICO, CUR, and additional JPEG 1 file extensions (like *.jfif).
